pageProduct.name: Thompson's Gel-Free Flaxseed Oil 1000mg 400 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Flaxseed Oil 1000mg is plant-based source of Omega 3, 6 & 9 fatty acids to support general health & skin health.

Thompson's Flaxseed Oil 1000mg is a plant-based source of Omega 3, 6 & 9 fatty acids. It has anti-inflammatory properties to relieve inflammation.
It also supports:
- General health & wellbeing in adults
- Skin health in women
Omega 3 & 6 essential fatty acids are important structural components of cell membranes. A diet lacking in Omega-3 fatty acid can lead to dry, rough and scaly skin. Provides a Fish Oil alternative.

Size: 400 Capsules

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Natural source of Linolenic Acid, which is an Omega-3 essential fatty acid required by the body for the maintenance of good health.
• ideal Fish Oil equivalent for vegetarians.
• Supports general health & wellbeing
• Supports skin health in women.
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly.

Warnings

If symptoms persist please consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Active ingredient per capsule:
Linseed Oil (Flaxseed Oil) 1g (1000mg).
equiv. Linolenic Acid (Omega-3) 575mg.
equiv. Linoleic Acid (Omega-6) 120mg.
equiv. Oleic Acid (Omega-9) 110mg.

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
